flawed_nl_solution:
He has to read 350 pages a week because 7 x 50 = <<7*50=350>>350
He has read 226 pages because 43+65+28+70+56 = <<43+65+28+70+56=226>>226
He has to read 124 pages on Saturday because 350-226 =<<350-226=124>>124

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 262, not 226. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
